tweets.text: I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

@AaronBell4NUL It is relentless and getting worse, not better at all. It is impacting on my ability to work, enjoy home, enjoy life in general. The @EnvAgency were hinting at this yesterday - totally inadequate #EnoughIsEnough @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off
@Regenerate_SOT @StinkStopthe Exposure for 8/9 hours a night every night not couple of mins every month, health of town is declining, along with local economy #stopthestink

urls.title: #EndSewagePollution-SewageBill ‚Ä¢ Surfers Against Sewage
urls.description: Philip Dunne MP is the main sponsor of this Bill and will be there when the Bill is debated. How about telling your friends and family to contact their MP? Your MP has already pledged their support for the Bill but we really need them to show up for our rivers and attend the second reading debate. It looks like your MP does not make an email address available to their constituents. You can write to them at their postal address. Find the details on your MP's parliamentary page. Thank you for supporting The

2/5 Our @EnvAgencyMids #enforcement notice requires the #landfill operator to cap parts of #WalleysQuarry by midnight 30/04/21.

tweets.text: You can‚Äôt make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now ‚Äúbroken‚Äù so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?

@a_merrydew @SuzVW @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA Not sure if they are recorded but they are logged. You should get a reference number at the end of your phone call, if not please ask for one and keep for your records. Chase your email if you don‚Äôt get a reference number back too. #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Why was the @EnvAgency so slow to react and why increase the quantity of waste? Residents have complained for years and been ignored. This is the result. #StopTheStink #WalleysQuarry https://t.co/xfKPJ92MWh

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids Shameful #StopTheStink #WalleysQuarry #LandfillStillStinks https://t.co/iPLudSAnrq

@Tus_M_ @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @ShaunLintern The increase in tonnage was authorised retrospectively as @RedIndustries2 had already started tipping more waste than their permitted tonnage. @EnvAgency did not properly investigate or listen to objection of Silverdale Parish Counci. @EnvAgency are complicit in all of this mess

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Thanks for the update are you still here? The smell has got exponentially bad in the past hour after being fine all day. My girlfriend is 39wks pregnant and we both feel sick with bad headaches - all happened in past 1hr

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The fumes tonight are off the scale in Westlands, they‚Äôre so strong you can smell them through the purifier, this is one of the worst nights we‚Äôve ever had so far. For gods sake woman, do something a LOT more aggressive to STOP this! @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids The odour is getting worse and worse, night by night and has been since 2018. This is not your priority. It can‚Äôt be. If this if you working as hard as you can, then you are inept. This is out of control. #stopthestink

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency I'm no engineer but I knew capping 1 cell off would not stop the stink.  The place needs closing, Dinnis needs to step aside for a director who has the balls to do the best thing for the community rather than RED or themselves

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Nobody really believed this would stop the odour. I am actually encouraged by this update. EA have used the word sorry to the community for the first time and are taking further action.

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency I‚Äôm not only worried about the stench and the damage that does to our health. It‚Äôs the particulate levels, ammonia and methane along with others we can‚Äôt smell that terrifies me.

EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines, it seems that the EA are not confident that the capping work will produce the reduction in odour we have been hoping for.

This is very disappointing. (1/2) https://t.co/DIZFt1teMz
@tayz_BETH https://t.co/AKltHke0eB

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA I know you must be busy right now at @WalleysL counting the outstanding breaches (clue you only have 10 digits on your hands so best get your shoes & socks off) but it absolutely stinks here. We are eagerly awaiting you engaging with us ASAP.
@StinkStopthe https://t.co/L05ZKwEmf7

Glad to talk to Stuart George today & be clear on the @EnvAgencyMids ongoing plan beyond the #enforcement notice deadline for capping at #WalleysQuarry. 

This is our next focus & we'll share more next week once we've done the assurance on @RedIndustries2 work so far. https://t.co/eIXsWqD1s0

The most scary part of all this is waking up thinking it smells ok in the house, then start moving around and you notice it stinks to high heaven of gas. Just checked my cooker as it smells like pure gas. This is dangerous, an accident WILL happen sooner than later #stopthestink
